Package com.google.zxing.web

Class TimeoutFilter

java.lang.Object
com.google.zxing.web.TimeoutFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
jakarta.servlet.Filter
@WebFilter(urlPatterns="/w/decode", initParams=@WebInitParam(name="timeoutSec",value="10")) public final class TimeoutFilter extends Object implements jakarta.servlet.Filter
Protect the decode endpoint from long-running requests.
